quotes.author: Walt Disney
quotes.quote: The way to get started is to quit talking and begin doing.

quotes.author: Winston Churchill
quotes.quote: The pessimist sees difficulty in every opportunity. The optimist sees opportunity in every difficulty.

quotes.author: Will Rogers
quotes.quote: Don't let yesterday take up too much of today.

quotes.author: Vince Lombardi
quotes.quote: It's not whether you get knocked down, it's whether you get up.

quotes.author: Steve Jobs
quotes.quote: Your work is going to fill a large part of your life, and the only way to be truly satisfied is to do what you believe is great work.

quotes.author: Albert Einstein
quotes.quote: Strive not to be a success, but rather to be of value.

quotes.author: Robert H. Schuller
quotes.quote: Tough times never last, but tough people do.

quotes.author: Maya Angelou
quotes.quote: You will face many defeats in life, but never let yourself be defeated.

quotes.author: Zig Ziglar
quotes.quote: People often say that motivation doesn't last. Well, neither does bathing â€“ that's why we recommend it daily.

quotes.author: Helen Keller
quotes.quote: Optimism is the faith that leads to achievement. Nothing can be done without hope and confidence.

quotes.author: Confucius
quotes.quote: It does not matter how slowly you go as long as you do not stop.

quotes.author: Eleanor Roosevelt
quotes.quote: The future belongs to those who believe in the beauty of their dreams.

quotes.author: Michael Jordan
quotes.quote: I've missed more than 9000 shots in my career. I've lost almost 300 games. 26 times, I've been trusted to take the game winning shot and missed. I've failed over and over and over again in my life. And that is why I succeed.

quotes.author: John D. Rockefeller
quotes.quote: Don't be afraid to give up the good to go for the great.

quotes.author: Jim Rohn
quotes.quote: Either you run the day, or the day runs you.

quotes.author: Henry Ford
quotes.quote: Whether you think you can or you think you can't, you're right.

quotes.author: Franklin D. Roosevelt
quotes.quote: The only limit to our realization of tomorrow is our doubts of today.

quotes.author: Tony Robbins
quotes.quote: The only impossible journey is the one you never begin.

quotes.author: Nelson Mandela
quotes.quote: It always seems impossible until it's done.

quotes.author: Amelia Earhart
quotes.quote: The most difficult thing is the decision to act, the rest is merely tenacity.
